themes: increased visibility and frequency of media art
growth of interdisciplinary and experimental events
support and training for studio artists in public art
utilization of hotel occupancy tax for local artist opportunities
untapped potential of local artists in shaping public spaces
key_phrases: I’d love to see more media art showcased throughout the city
Fusebox-style events grow in number and visibility
public art training programs designed specifically for studio artists
helping them navigate the public art process
access opportunities funded by Austin’s hotel occupancy tax
untapped potential for local artists to shape the public realm
barriers_identified: lack of public art training programs for studio artists
difficulty navigating the public art process
limited access to opportunities funded by hotel occupancy tax
solutions_proposed: showcase more media art throughout the city
increase number and visibility of Fusebox-style, interdisciplinary events
create public art training programs for studio artists
help artists navigate the public art process
improve access to hotel occupancy tax-funded opportunities for local artists
